import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from "reactstrap" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import './livingroom-card.css'; const LivingroomCard = ({livingroom}) => { const {id, title, photo, price, reviews } = livingroom; const totalRating=reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.rating,0); return (
{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ( ({reviews.length}) )}
{title}
${price}/one item
) } export default LivingroomCard
